name: 陳堯輝
objective: This course is designed for the students with engineering background. There are five subjects including: dynamics, thermo-physics, electricity and magnetism, optics, and modern physics. There are two semesters of this course. Each semester includes 3 hours per week of lecture.
schedule: 1.　　Static electricity, 2. Electric field, 3. Electric field, 4. Electric potential, 5.capacitance and dielectrics, 6. capacitance and dielectrics, 7. Current, resistance, and electromotive force 8. Direct-current circuits, 9.middle examination. 10. magnetic force, 11.magnetic force, 12.magnetic field, 13. magnetic field, 14.electromagnetic inductance, 15.alternating circuits, 16. alternating circuits, 17.electromagnetic waves, 18.final examination.
materials: SEARS AND ZEMANSKY'S  University Physics with modern physics.
